a71ce4c0e4339f68001bca9fd1cede621ccdf678.commitMessage: Issue #3212: aligned string array setters for properties

6d5c0da42fa54ceabbc1959e9db354ed64a2ff86.commitMessage:
Remove unnecessary this keyword. #1555

Fixes `UnnecessaryThis` inspection violations.

Description:
>Reports on any unnecessary uses of this in the code. Using this to disambiguate a code reference may easily become unnecessary via automatic refactorings, and is discouraged by many coding styles.
 For example:
 ```
 this.a = 3;
 ```

b930ba24beb9c8c165b4ba1bf530cee4c2d87b0f.commitMessage: correction of parsing of attributes in AtclauseOrderCheck, #1152

ff5cbc39c4882b3a3dcdbedcad9393e170148725.commitMessage:
Replace verbose type arguments with diamond type <>

This syntax is not supported under Java 6 or earlier, but Checkstyle codebase uses Java 7 already.

dfc803a1cc442bafeb5aa375f0d9f0a31d655ff2.commitMessage:
Use Collections.addAll() instead of adding elements individually

As per javadoc, `Collections.addAll()` may be significantly faster than adding elements individually using a for loop.
